snippet: Michael Sokolove got to know Oscar Pistorius, the pioneering South African athlete now charged with the murder of his girlfriend. Rendezvous' editor, Marcus Mabry, spoke with him about the sports star's tragic turn.
abstract: Michael Sokolove got to know Oscar Pistorius, the pioneering South African athlete now charged with the murder of his girlfriend. Rendezvous' editor, Marcus Mabry, spoke with him about the sports star's tragic turn.

headline.main: What It Was Like to Spend Time With Oscar Pistorius
